---
title: "Assignment2- Questions"

---

Save the attached file (assignment2_data) as an Excel file (.csv, .xls or .xlsx format), then import this data to R. (You can supply an inline CSV file instead of importing, if you like).

1.Take a sample of 100 observations from this data, and save this sample as a new data. Answer the following questions according to this new data.

2.Calculate the mean sales’ values for each color.
3.Calculate the mean sales’ values for each region.
4.Identify the five highest sales’ value according to date, color and region separately.
5.Identify the month in which the mean sales’ value is the highest.
6.Plot the sales according to years
